name: Laugh now Cry later
description:
This is the first piece to a 3 part series of a hand drawn original picture of The Joker & Harley Quinn. 

It will go through 3 stages, this one being the first the next will be color added and fully digitized and the last will be a physical product. 

So, every person who  buys one of the first 2 will have the chance of buying the physical product of their choice, Bomber Jackets, hoodies, shirts coffee cups etc. All will be made with High end material. 

All items will be limited and only available for a short time when they are sold out it's over. 

Those who buy both of stage 1-2 will have the chance to win something free of a physical form as well. 

Straight Hustlas Under Structure Brand is the creator of this and can be found on instagram, the page is private, so be patient if you add us, we will confirm your page and let you in.  

Thank you to all before hand and let's have fun building the Metaverse  

ps. inbox or tag us on IG to show proof of purchase
